original: xSimultaneous Internet Streaming x OTT Television x Internet Protocol Television x Radio, short wave, microwave, fiber optic x Alternative, secondary and specialty distribution x Stored as VOD, Content Distribution Networks/Company Servers x Full Television Broadcast Rights:
ollama_generated:
Concurrent Online Streaming, Over-the-Top (OTT) Television, Internet Protocol Television, Radio (Including Short Wave, Microwave, Fiber Optic), and Alternative, Secondary, or Specialty Distribution - Conditional Upon Approval:

The Grantor hereby grants the Licensee full rights to stream, distribute, and broadcast content simultaneously across various platforms specified above. However, this grant is contingent upon the prior approval of the Grantor for any proposed means of distribution not explicitly mentioned in this clause or involving methods outside of the norms within the industry. The content, whether stored on Content Distribution Networks, Company Servers, or as Video-on-Demand (VOD), shall remain subject to these conditions. This grant includes, but is not limited to, full television broadcast rights.

Authorized Language Alternate:

In the event of any conflict between the languages of this Agreement, the English version shall prevail. However, in case of ambiguity or uncertainty in the English text, the language of the parties' preference at the time of executing this Agreement shall be deemed controlling for interpretation purposes only.

original: Producer Information Producer: Fulucai Productions Ltd.

Data Provision Responsible Party: Fulucai Productions Ltd. (Data Provider)

In the event of any dispute arising out of this agreement, the burden of proof regarding the accuracy and completeness of data shall lie primarily with the recipient of such data. The Data Provider shall provide all necessary assistance to the recipient in verifying and validating the data but shall not be held liable for any errors, omissions or inconsistencies that may exist within the provided data unless proven otherwise by the recipient.

original: (f) The grant of rights and license pursuant to this Section 1 shall include, but not be limited to, the right of ConvergTV to Distribute and re-Distribute all or any portions of the Program and Promotional Works, including excerpts therefrom, and any new and different versions of the Program, on simultaneous internet transmission or streaming, internet protocol television and any television networks and stations, and/or other distribution outlets, via domestic or foreign television signals, as well as through CATV and DBS systems, satellite, microwave, fiber optic and/or other modes of Distribution yet to be developed, but which may be utilized by ConvergTV in the future. ConvergTV shall have the right to insert commercials within the Program.
ollama_generated: (f) The grant of rights and license under this Section 1 extends, yet not exclusively, to authorize ConvergTV to broadcast, stream, or redistribute, in whole or in part, the Program and Promotional Works, including extracts thereof, and any novel adaptations of the Program. This permission encompasses simultaneous internet transmission, internet protocol television, traditional terrestrial television networks and stations, as well as other distribution channels such as cable TV, direct broadcast satellite, satellite, microwave, fiber optics, or any future modes of Distribution developed by ConvergTV. The license further permits ConvergTV to incorporate advertisements within the Program. However, it is understood that ConvergTV bears no obligation to exercise all or any of these rights and licenses at its sole discretion.

2. Receipt of Goods and Services.

Upon receipt of the goods and services by the Client, Supplier shall be deemed to have fulfilled its obligations under this Agreement, provided that any issues or discrepancies with respect to the goods or services received shall be promptly reported to Supplier in writing for resolution within a reasonable timeframe.

original: 4. Program Exclusivity For The License Term Within The Licensed Territory . During the License Term (which is identified in the Deal Terms), Producer agrees that ConvergTV has the exclusive right to exercise the rights granted to it under this Agreement with respect to the Program, including those in Section 1, within the Licensed Territory.
modified: 4. Non-Exclusivity for the License Term Within the Licensed Territory: During the License Term (as defined in the Deal Terms), Producer acknowledges that ConvergTV may exercise some, but not necessarily all, of the rights granted to it under this Agreement with respect to the Program, including those outlined in Section 1, within the Licensed Territory. The Producer retains the right to grant licenses for the Program to third parties outside of the exclusivity granted to ConvergTV within the Licensed Territory and during the License Term.

original: (f) it will not permit its Programs, other than as provided in this Agreement, to be displayed in full length, or nearly full length, on or through any channel, distribution or other platforms or services, or by any other means, including but not limited to the distribution or viewing platforms or services of ConvergTV’s competitors; (g) it has not violated any law, rule, or regulation in connection with the creation or distribution of the Program; and (h) it shall comply with the Producer Performance Standards set forth in Exhibit C .
modified:
(f') The party agrees that its Programs, other than as specified in this Agreement, may be displayed in a manner that is not full-length or nearly full-length, on any channel, distribution platform, or service, or by any means, including but not limited to the viewing platforms or services of ConvergTV's competitors. However, this permission does not extend to any broadcasting or distribution that conflicts with the rights and exclusivity agreements outlined in this Agreement.

   (g') The party warrants that it has not, in connection with the creation or distribution of the Program, violated any law, rule, or regulation. If any such violation is discovered, the party shall promptly notify ConvergTV in writing and cooperate fully to rectify the situation to the satisfaction of ConvergTV.

   (h') The Producer shall be responsible for ensuring compliance with the Producer Performance Standards set forth in Exhibit C. Any deviation from these standards must be disclosed to ConvergTV in writing prior to implementation, and ConvergTV reserves the right to approve or reject such deviations at its discretion.

original: 11. Monetization of Content.  The Producer agrees and authorizes ConvergTV, its subsidiaries, agents and/or assigns to monetize the Producer’s Program and content by traditional ad (commercial) insertion; product placement; branded programming; overlays; interactive advertising;
ollama_generated: 11. Monetization of Content. The Producer grants ConvergTV, its subsidiaries, agents, or assigns the right and discretion to monetize the Producer’s Program and content through traditional ad (commercial) insertions, product placements, branded programming, overlays, interactive advertising; however, any revenues generated shall be shared equally between the Producer and ConvergTV. The Producer bears no responsibility for the effectiveness or success of these monetization methods.

14. Entire Understanding . This Agreement, comprising of the Deal Terms, any and all exhibits, schedules or attachments to this Agreement, embodies the full extent of the understanding between the Parties, nullifying any prior, written or oral agreements that may have existed regarding the subject matter detailed within this document. It is acknowledged by all parties that no verbal or written promises, commitments, arrangements, or assurances, other than those explicitly stated herein, are binding on the Parties with respect to the matters encompassed in this Agreement.

SERVICE PROVIDER (ConvergTV, Inc.)

In the event that this Agreement is terminated for any reason by either Party, Service Provider shall have a period of thirty (30) days following such termination to remedy any outstanding obligations under this Agreement. If the Service Provider fails to fulfill these obligations within said period, Client shall be entitled to pursue legal action against the Service Provider to recover damages incurred as a result of such failure.

(Original clause: This Agreement may be terminated by either Party. Upon termination, ConvergTV, Inc. (Client) shall have a period of thirty (30) days following such termination to remedy any outstanding obligations under this Agreement. If ConvergTV, Inc. fails to fulfill these obligations within said period, ConvergTV, Inc. shall be liable for damages incurred as a result of such failure.)
